q1.question: Can I change plans later?
q1.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

q2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q2.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and bank transfers for annual plans.

q3.question: Is there a free trial?
q3.answer: Yes! Our Free plan is available forever with no credit card required. You can upgrade anytime as your team grows.

q4.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
q4.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limits. You can upgrade your plan or we'll help you find the best solution for your needs.

q5.question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits?
q5.answer: Yes! We offer special pricing for non-profit organizations and educational institutions. Contact our sales team for details.

q6.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q6.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties. Your data will remain accessible for 30 days after cancellation.
